articles.title: Being 'fat but fit' isn't really possible, study says - New York Post

articles.title: Virus explainer: A look at the variant showing up in the Bay Area - San Francisco Chronicle
articles.description: The L452R mutation that was present in less than 4% of cases examined in mid-December was found in more than 25% of the cases examined through early January and has been linked to several Bay Area outbreaks.
